item.title: The ‘Rocket Docket’ Judge Who Will Decide the Fate of Google’s Ad Technology
item.description: The ruling by a federal judge, Leonie Brinkema, in an antitrust case over Google’s advertising technology could add to the internet company’s woes.

item.title: U.S. Says Google Is an Ad Tech Monopolist in Closing Arguments
item.description: The two sides made their final cases to a federal judge Monday in a trial over the tech giant’s dominance in technology selling ads online.

item.title: Kennedy’s Antivax Views and Friends Can Cause Real Damage
item.description: What he did during a measles epidemic in Samoa shouldn’t be forgotten.
